data.title: How a product design agency started a charity campaign
data.meta_description: Glow Team's blog post details their journey in launching a charity campaign, blending design expertise with social responsibility.
data.description: Donating to the Armed Forces of Ukraine is a cool habit for most of Ukrainians. However, in May the donations dropped significantly, though…

paragraphs.text: Why is design also a front line?
I Believe in U. The idea.
Video filming and posting. The organic reach.
Help is important and help is needed — the war rages on.
